Text:
I'm promoting my screensavers, one by one, this is a free site and i'm not breaking any rules, so please, stop spamming my post's.

Is better to me and for the users to choose what screensaver download viewing the picture in the torrent post.
Support @Screensavers, also, I enjoy getting updated when you post a new SS on my RSS feed. AND you can tell how well liked each individual SS is based on the comments and amount of peers...
